damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: The Riptide combines the armoured resilience and overwhelming firepower of a heavy battle tank with the agility of a swift and skilful warrior. Powered by a thrumming nova reactor, the battlesuit can overcharge its systems at need, while its massed firepower can eradicate entire formations of enemy warriors or armoured vehicles.

otherAbilities.Battlesuit Support System:: The bearer is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back .
otherAbilities.Nova Charge:: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase , select one ranged weapon equipped by this model. Until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
otherAbilities.Weapon Support System:: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll .
